title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added feature flag `dependabot-option-cooldown` to conditionally hide cooldown documentation for GHES versions ≤3.19.
Updated MCP setup instructions to use VS Code's built-in extension marketplace instead of external browser steps.
Removed manual OAuth steps for GitHub MCP server setup, replacing with direct VS Code extension installation.
summary:
- Added feature flag `dependabot-option-cooldown` to conditionally hide cooldown documentation for GHES versions ≤3.19.
- Updated MCP setup instructions to use VS Code's built-in extension marketplace instead of external browser steps.
- Removed manual OAuth steps for GitHub MCP server setup, replacing with direct VS Code extension installation.
generated_title: Doc: Hide Dependabot cooldown for old GHES and integrate MCP Registry in VS Code

**d859b78**: Hide Dependabot cooldown option from GHES documents (#58014) (by Tomoko Tanaka)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added feature flag `dependabot-option-cooldown` to conditionally hide cooldown documentation for GHES versions ≤3.19.
- Updated MCP setup instructions to use VS Code's built-in extension marketplace instead of external browser steps.
- Removed manual OAuth steps for GitHub MCP server setup, replacing with direct VS Code extension installation.

### Title
Doc: Hide Dependabot cooldown for old GHES and integrate MCP Registry in VS Code
